articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Russian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Russian Political Party
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
					It was handed over to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is head of the visiting delegation of the party, on Monday.

articles.title: Secretary of WPK Central Committee Meets Russian Party Delegation
articles.content:
Secretary of WPK Central Committee Meets Russian Party Delegation
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Monday met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation. It is led by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is vice-chairman of the Economic Policy Committee of the State Duma of Russia.

articles.title: Protocol on Cooperation Signed between WPK, Russian Party
articles.content:
Protocol on Cooperation Signed between WPK, Russian Party
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A protocol on cooperation between the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Communist Party of the Russian Federation was signed here on Monday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the WPK side were Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Kim Song Nam, vice department director, and other officials of the Central Committee of the WPK and from the opposite side the members of the delegation of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation led by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the Central Committee of the party and vice-chairman of the Economic Policy Committee of the State Duma of Russia.
					
					 The protocol was signed by Kim Yong Il and Kazbek Taysaev.

articles.title: Russian Political Party Delegation Feted
articles.content:
Russian Political Party Delegation Feted
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea gave a reception in honor of the visiting delegation of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Monday.
					Present on invitation were members of the delegation headed by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and vice-chairman of the Economic Policy Committee of the State Duma of Russia, and Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, his embassy officials.
					
					Present there were Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, and officials of the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					Kim Yong Il said in his speech made at the reception that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided and developed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il have reached a higher level under the meticulous care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					He expressed thanks to the Communist Party of the Russian Federation for extending positive support to the party and people of the DPRK in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and defending peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					We will as ever strive hard to boost the cooperative relations with the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and deepen the friendship and fraternity between the peoples of the two counties, he stressed.
					
					Kazbek Taysaev said in his speech that the long-standing ties of friendship between the peoples of the two countries have developed for the last several decades.
					
					He went on:
					
					Comrades Stalin, Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il clarified theoretical and practical issues for a victorious advance of the cause of socialism.
					
					I extend a sincere thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, outstanding statesman of the world stature and great leader of the Korean people, in the name of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation for paying deep attention to making the current Pyongyang Photo Exhibition successful.

articles.title: Russian VIPs Here
articles.content:
Russian VIPs Here
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Galushka, minister of the Development of Far East who is chairman of the Russian side to the Inter-governmental Committee for Cooperation in Trade, Economy, Science and Technology between the DPRK and Russia, and his party arrived here on Monday on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition Opens to Mark Kim Il Sung's Visits to Soviet Union
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition Opens to Mark Kim Il Sung's Visits to Soviet Union
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Photo Exhibition "History of Friendship" opened at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to mark the 65th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's first historic official visit to the Soviet Union and the 30th anniversary of his official visit to it in 1984.
					It was sponsored by the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
					
					Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un who provided and strengthened the DPRK-Russia friendly relations.
					
					Also displayed there were photos dealing with the reverence of the Russian people for the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					Present at the opening ceremony were Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Ki Nam and DPRK Vice Premier Kang Sok Ju, who are members of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, and other officials concerned, working people in Pyongyang, the delegation of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation led by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and vice-chairman of the Economic Policy Committee of the State Duma of Russia, Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					Present on invitation were diplomatic envoys and embassy officials of different countries here.
					
					An opening address by Alexandr Timonin was followed by congratulatory speeches by Kim Ki Nam and Kazbek Taysaev.
					
					Kim Ki Nam expressed thanks to the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation for proposing the exhibition and striving for its success.
					
					He said that it is the consistent stand of the WPK and the DPRK government to boost the DPRK-Russia friendly relations in the spirit of the joint documents adopted between the two countries.
					
					Kazbek Taysaev said that the exhibition is a clear expression of the comradely relations and solidarity existing between the two parties.
					
					Highly praising the greatness of Kim Jong Un, he noted that the humankind is admiring the struggle of the Korean people rushing forward like a shot for the bright future under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					The participants looked round the exhibition hall.
					
					The opening ceremony was followed by the film show.
					
					The participants watched the Korean documentary film "History of Everlasting Friendship."

articles.title: Premier Makes Field Survey of Central Zoo in Progress of Remodeling
articles.content:
Premier Makes Field Survey of Central Zoo in Progress of Remodeling
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Central Zoo in the process of remodeling.
					 Going round new structures which are under construction and various objects in the process of remodeling, he learned in detail about the project and material supply.
					
					 A consultative meeting of officials concerned took place on the spot. 
					
					 The meeting discussed the issues of building a comprehensive natural museum, increasing the species of animals, supplying food and water, bettering the veterinary and anti-epizootic system and successfully conducting the greening of the zoo so as to fundamentally improve its environment, and took relevant measures.
					
					 It called upon builders and officials and employees of the zoo to finish the project at an early date. 
					
					 Earlier, the premier went round new various kiosks to be used at  commercial service networks.

articles.title: Premier Makes Field Survey of Children's Camp Remodeling
articles.content:
Premier Makes Field Survey of Children's Camp Remodeling
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju acquainted himself with the remodeling of the Songdowon International Children's Camp on the spot.
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un initiated remodeling the camp associated with the immortal leadership exploits of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il into the best extracurricular education base in the world and entrusted the service personnel with the task.
					
					 The soldier builders are working hard to guarantee the best quality of the project in hearty response to Kim Jong Un's noble outlook on the coming generation.
					
					 The premier went round the reconstruction site following the route of the field guidance given by Kim Jong Un in February.
					
					 He convened a consultative meeting of the officials concerned.
					
					 The meeting emphasized the issue of pushing ahead with the preparations for the operation of the camp to keep up with a rapid progress being made in the remodeling to receive campers on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 The premier also visited the Taean Heavy Machine Complex to take a measure for the timely supply of equipment needed for the cascade power stations along the River Chongchon.
					
					 He also went round the Sunchon Chemical Complex and the Sunchon Nitro-Lime Fertilizer Factory.

Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju acquainted himself with the remodeling of the Songdowon International Children's Camp on the spot.

articles.title: Moranbong Band Performs
articles.content:
Moranbong Band Performs
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Moranbong Band warmly loved by the people gave a performance at the April 25 House of Culture before full house on Sunday.
					 The performance began with female chorus "The People's Joy". Put on the stage were diverse numbers such as female solos and pangchang "We Think of Marshal Day and Night" and "A Song of a Big Haul of Fish."
					
					 The performers represented with cheerful music the immortal feats supreme leader Kim Jong Un has performed by powerfully demonstrating the dignity of the great Paektusan nation and the spirit of achieving prosperity.
					
					 The performance pervaded with hymns in the great era of Kim Jong Un reached its climax when the band presented female quartet "We Cannot Live without You" and female chorus "We Know Nobody but You".
					
					 The audience was mesmerized by the unique and refined artistic representation full of the performers' enthusiasm and optimism, high artistry and fantastic and peculiar stage decor.
					
					 The performance goes on amid great expectation and concern of people from all walks of life, youth and students and citizens.

articles.title: Forestation Put on Scientific Basis in DPRK
articles.content:
Forestation Put on Scientific Basis in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been paid to putting forestation on a scientific basis in the DPRK. 
					 The Academy of Forestry, which plays an important role in foresting the whole country, has succeeded in putting the creation of mixed forest on a scientific basis, thus laying foundations of increasing forest resources.
					
					 The academy has developed a method of cultivating saplings based on no-power mist sprayers.
					
					 It completed an agro-forestry e-map, making it possible to select sites appropriate for agro-forestry management.
					
					 The academy has also cultivated different species of saplings, including Larix leptolepis, suitable for the climate and natural features of the country.
					
					 It has improved the system of breeding and seed selection which has proved effective in forestation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Puts up Many Revolutionary Slogans
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Puts up Many Revolutionary Slogans
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il put up revolutionary and militant slogans in every period of the developing revolution and at its each stage, thus providing the army and people of the DPRK with powerful weapons to emerge victorious in the indomitable mental power in hearty response to the call of the Party and the leader.
					 He declared the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism as the supreme programme of the Party at the Third Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea on Feb. 19, Juche 63 (1974), arousing all service personnel and people to the struggle for the final victory in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The slogan "Let us produce, study and live like the anti-Japanese guerrillas!" put up by him in March 1974 served as a mighty banner for further intensifying the drive for carrying forward and developing the revolutionary tradition of Juche.
					
					 The slogans "Let us meet the requirements of Juche in ideology, technology and culture!" and "Let us give fuller play to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance!" advanced by him in the 1970s made the whole country seethe with drives for creation and construction.
					
					 The slogan "Let us all live and struggle like heroes!" put forth by him in May 1988 made the heroic work style prevail throughout society.
					
					 The slogans "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" and "Let us arm ourselves more firmly with the revolutionary ideas of the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung!" put up by him in 1994 aroused all the service personnel and people to the struggle for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The slogans "Forward for the forced march for the final victory!", "Break through the cutting edge!", "Keep your feet firmly planted on your land and look out over the world!" and "Everything for the victory in the drive for great upswing!" served as the engines that helped the service personnel and people perform miracles of Songun Korea, weathering all sorts of difficulties and trials. 
					
					 The slogans such as "Let us live our own way!" and "We serve the people!" and "Love the young people!" were also advanced by him.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Steady Continuity to History and Tradition of Self-Reliance
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Steady Continuity to History and Tradition of Self-Reliance
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- All officials, party members and other working people should give full play to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude whose might has been clearly proven in the protracted historical struggle, and the spirit of achieving the prosperity of the great Paektusan nation, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Korean people have advanced the revolution and construction by holding fast to self-reliance as their lifeline since the very day of starting the building of rich and powerful country.
					
					 The spirit of making Yanji bomb displayed in the forest of Mt. Paektu brought about the shining victory of the anti-Japanese war, and the great advance made in the spirit of self-reliance that prevailed in the 1950s helped the country open the gate of socialist industrialization much earlier than other countries.
					
					 Self-reliance represents the ever-victorious banner of the Korean revolution and the eternal spirit of the DPRK.
					
					 We have to steadily advance along the road of self-reliance, in the future, too, just as we weathered all sorts of hardships and trials of history, firmly believing in our own efforts.
					
					 It is necessary to give fuller play to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance. This provides the master key to giving fullest play to the advantages and might of Korean-style socialism, something hardly imaginable under capitalism, and making socialism incomparably superior to capitalism in all aspects.
					
					 We should make a breakthrough in the general onward movement this year, too, by our own efforts and register a shining victory in it just as we have recorded a heroic epic of self-reliance in the annals of the revolution.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Chieftain Standing against Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Chieftain Standing against Korea's Reunification
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. becomes impotent only when all Koreans turn out in the drive for national reunification with their concerted efforts, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has blocked the reunification of Korea, fostering alienation and confrontation between the north and the south of Korea since it divided the Korean nation. 
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that the U.S. imperialists made every possible effort to frustrate the historic Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Public Organizations in North and South Korea held in April 1948 to prevent permanent national division and achieve complete independence and sovereignty of Korea after its liberation. 
					
					 Afterwards, when the DPRK set forth an epochal proposal for averting the ever-mounting danger of war on the Korean peninsula and achieving peaceful national reunification, the U.S. imperialists sent warmonger Dulles to south Korea to egg the Syngman Rhee clique on to ignite a war, blustering that it should "reject compromise or concession with the north". 
					
					 In the 1970s they put forward the "two Koreas" policy aiming at permanent division of the Korean nation as their Korea strategy and made desperate efforts to implement it. 
					
					 The inter-Korean summit, the first of its kind in history, took place in Pyongyang in June 2000 and the historic June 15 joint declaration was adopted. 
					
					 However, only the U.S. resorted to the mean moves to block the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration, making an open complaint that it is something unimaginable for friendly countries not to notify a surprising decision in advance. 
					
					 When the north-south relations have recently shown sign of improvement, the U.S. relapsed into bad habit. 
					
					 The present situation proves that it is impossible to ensure peace and security on the Korean peninsula and achieve the independent reunification unless the U.S. imperialists' interference and obstructive moves are terminated.

articles.title: South Korean Naval Maneuvers Staged in West Sea of Korea
articles.content:
South Korean Naval Maneuvers Staged in West Sea of Korea
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean navy staged maneuvers in waters of the West Sea of Korea west of Phyongthaek, Kyonggi Province as part of the on-going Foal Eagle joint military exercises against the DPRK, according to south Korean KBS on Mar. 23.
					 The maneuvers were staged with a huge naval force including various type warships such as Aegis ships and destroyers and helicopters involved under the simulated conditions of coping with the north's warships crossing the "northern limit line."

articles.title: Statement of DPRK National Defence Commission Supported by Russian and Polish Organizations
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK National Defence Commission Supported by Russian and Polish Organizations
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Russian and Polish organizations issued statements on March 17 and 18 supporting the statement of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK said:
					
					 There is no country in the world like the DPRK which has been exposed to the most frantic blockade and open nuclear threat for a long period.
					
					 The U.S. is trying to stifle the DPRK in a bid to dominate the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The DPRK has held high a treasured sword of justice to defend its sovereignty in coping with the threat of the hostile forces and has access to reliable deterrence capable of smashing the aggression by the enemy, turning into an invincible fortress.
					
					 The U.S. should mind its human rights situation before talking about the DPRK's non-existent "human rights issue".
					
					 We will as ever make positive efforts for peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association noted:
					
					 The frantic moves of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK have reached a grave stage which cannot be overlooked any longer.
					
					 The DPRK has access to nuclear weapons, an unavoidable choice made by it to cope with the U.S. ceaseless nuclear threat.
					
					 It is high time the U.S. withdrew its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK and established a new realistic policy.

articles.title: Statement of DPRK National Defence Commission Supported by Kyrgyzstan Political Party
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK National Defence Commission Supported by Kyrgyzstan Political Party
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan issued a statement on March 18 supporting the statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The statement of the NDC of the DPRK reflects unshakable stand of the army and people of the DPRK to thoroughly frustrate the hostile policy of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are leaving no stone unturned to stifle socialist Korea.
					
					 The U.S. is openly posing military threat on the DPRK and, at same time, talking about its non-existent "human rights issue".
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. may resort to the hostile policy toward the DPRK it can not block the advance of the latter, a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher in which the leader, party and masses get united single-mindedly.

articles.title: Indonesian Political Party Warns U.S. to Stop Acting Rashly
articles.content:
Indonesian Political Party Warns U.S. to Stop Acting Rashly
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle in a statement on Mar. 18 warned the U.S. to stop acting rashly, bearing in mind that the DPRK has access to powerful nuclear deterrence and military capability.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. has threatened peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and disturbed Korea's reunification while pursuing from long ago the hostile policy to obliterate the DPRK politically, isolate it economically and stifle it militarily.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that the U.S. has made every possible effort to break the revolutionary faith of the service personnel and people of the DPRK who have been firmly armed with the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and stifle Korean-style socialism by dint of the American-style democracy and market economy.
					
					 The U.S. had better set right its human rights performance and apologize for the human rights abuses committed by it in other countries before kicking up a groundless "human rights" racket against the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK's Principled Stand Supported by Political Parties and Organizations of Pakistan
articles.content:
DPRK's Principled Stand Supported by Political Parties and Organizations of Pakistan
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Pakistani political parties and organizations expressed support to the statement of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 They included the Sind State Committee of the Awami National Party, Peasants and Working People's Party, Pakistan National Federation of Trade Unions, All-Pakistan Trade Union Organization, Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association and Karachi Juche Study Center.
					
					 They released a joint statement on March 18.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK aimed to suffocate it politically, economically and militarily and acts pursuant to it have recently reached a grave stage. 
					
					 The U.S. is strengthening "sanctions" and "isolation and blockade" against the DPRK and posing open military threat to it over its self-defensive nuclear deterrence. This will bring the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 The U.S. is resorting to the "human rights" racket against the DPRK by fabricating facts. Such racket is reaching an extreme state, going beyond the danger line.
					
					 The Pakistani people demand the U.S. make a policy decision to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and lift all the measures pursuant to the policy, have a correct view and stand on the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK and stop the anti-DPRK human rights racket at once, though belatedly.
					
					 We also demand the U.S. stop interfering in the internal affairs of the DPRK, withdraw its forces from south Korea and disband the "UN Command".
					
					 The Pakistani people will always stand on the side of the Korean people.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Condemn U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Condemn U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on March 15.
					 It said:
					
					 The U.S. should make a policy decision to roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and lift all the measures pursuant to the policy, though belatedly.
					
					 The U.S. should have a proper viewpoint and stand on the DPRK's nuclear deterrence and stop behaving foolishly, letting loose a string of reckless remarks that the "DPRK's dismantlement of its nukes first" is the "keynote" of the hostile policy towards it.
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once its groundless "human rights" racket against the DPRK which began as part of its new hostile policy towards the latter.
					
					 To roll back its worn-out hostile policy towards the DPRK would be beneficial not only to meeting the U.S. interests but also to ensuring the security of its mainland.
					
					 The U.S. should bear this in mind.
					
					 Socialist Korea remains stable as the party, army and people are single-mindedly united and it will make a steady advance in the future, too.
					
					 The imperialists and reactionaries can never realize their wild ambition to bring down Korean-style socialism.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Myanmar
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Myanmar
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of Myanmar for celebrating the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Yangon on March 17.
					 Aung Thein Lynn, member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including meeting, friendly gathering, photo exhibition and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Serbia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Serbia
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A Serbian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Belgrade on March 13.
					 Batric Mijovic, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including meeting, seminar and lecture between April 1 and 20.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Iran
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Iran
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Tehran on March 15.
					 Hamid Reza Taraghi, vice general secretary of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Italy and Brazil
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Italy and Brazil
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Events were held in Italy and Brazil on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 A lecture and a book and photo exhibition took place in Rome City and a seminar in Sao Paulo City on March 7 and 8.
					
					 On display at the venue of the exhibition were works of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un and photos and books dealing with the proud successes achieved by the Korean people in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Speakers including the national coordinator of the Communist Youth Front of Italy said that the Koreans and other progressive people of the world have significantly celebrated the Day of the Sun, birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, every year, noting with high appreciation that the founding of the Juche idea is the greatest feat performed by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They praised him for defeating two imperialisms in one generation and laying a firm foundation for the DPRK to emerge victorious, unfazed by any moves of the imperialists to stifle it. 
					
					 The chairman and secretary general of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea explained the essence, originality and vitality of the Juche idea in combination with the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 They referred to the fact that Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary ideas of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, underscoring the need to intensify the work for studying and disseminating Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the future.

articles.title: Premier coreano reconoce el estado de remodelacion de Parque Zoologico Nacional
articles.content:
Premier coreano reconoce el estado de remodelacion de Parque Zoologico Nacional
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, hizo conocimiento del estado de reconstruccion del Parque Zoologico Nacional.
					Recorriendo nuevas obras arquitectonicas y otros objetos en reconstruccion, averiguo el estado de la obra y el aseguramiento de materiales.
					
					En  la reunion de los funcionarios de las ramas relacionadas sostenida en el terreno se discutieron los temas para construir el parque natural combinado y aumentar la variedad de los animales, para establecer el sistema de aseguramiento de pienso y agua y el de prevencion veterinaria y mejorar el medioambiente al hacer bien la creacion de zona verde y se tomaron las medidas concernientes.
					
					El premier subrayo que los constructores y los funcionarios y empleados del parque deben terminar la obra en un corto tiempo.
					
					Con anterioridad, el paso revista a los quioscos de nuevo tipo a utilizarse en la red de servicio comercial.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju visita Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon en remodelacion
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju visita Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon en remodelacion
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno los detalles de reconstruccion del Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon.
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un propuso transformar el campamento, donde estan grabadas las inmortales hazanas de direccion de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, como la mejor base de educacion extraescolar del mundo, y encargo la tarea de reconstruccion a los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Los militares movilizados construyen todos los edificios en el maximo nivel cualitativo teniendo presente la noble concepcion de su Comandante Supremo sobre las futuras generaciones.
					
					Pak recorrio varios edificios siguiendo el itinerario de la visita de orientacion del Mariscal, realizada en febrero pasado.
					
					El organizo la reunion consultiva de los funcionarios interesados.
					
					En la ocasion se dio enfasis en preparar bien la operacion del campamento para acoger a los campistas desde el Dia del Sol (15 de abril).
					
					Por otra parte, en el Complejo de Maquinaria Pesada de Taean, Pak tomo las medidas para producir y suministrar a tiempo los equipos necesarios a la construccion de las plantas hidroelectricas escalonadas del rio Chongchon.
					
					Estuvo tambien en el Complejo Quimico y la Fabrica de Abono Nitrogenado y Calcico de Sunchon.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a dar continuidad a la historia y tradicion de autoconfianza
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a dar continuidad a la historia y tradicion de autoconfianza
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- En el editorial de hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que todos los funcionarios, los militantes del partido y los trabajadores deben poner de pleno manifiesto el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y perseverancia cuyo poderio se ha comprobado en la larga lucha historica y demostrar el temple de la potencia del monte Paektu en prosperidad, y continua:
					El pueblo coreano viene impulsando la revolucion y la construccion tomando la autoconfianza como linea vital desde el principio de construccion de una patria prospera.
					
					El espiritu con que los guerrilleros antijaponeses habian fabricado desde el cero la bomba de Yanji trajo la brillante victoria de la guerra antijaponesa y la gran marcha de autoconfianza de la decada de 1950 permitio a la patria cumplir la industrializacion socialista acortando varios siglos.
					
					La autoconfianza es la bandera de victoria de la revolucion coreana y el espiritu eterno de Corea.
					
					Como han superado hasta la fecha todas las pruebas y dificultades de la historia confiando en las fuerzas propias, hay que seguir avanzando siempre por ese camino.
					
					Cuando se manifieste altamente el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza, se podra demostrar la superioridad y el poderio del socialismo al estilo coreano, que no puede tener ni imitar el capitalismo, y hacer abismales las diferencias entre dos modelos sociales.
					
					Al igual que en las pasadas decadas de la revolucion, se debe lograr victorias orgullosas en la ofensiva general de este ano abriendo el paso con fuerzas propias.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta palabras del alto militar norteamericano
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta palabras del alto militar norteamericano
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- Recientemente, en lo tocante al problema de la Peninsula Coreana, el jefe del Estado Mayor de las fuerzas terrestres de Estados Unidos dijo que "la preocupacion mas grande es la posibilidad del estallido de guerra por equivocacion" y agrego que ese imperio debe hacer todo lo posible para prevenirla.
					Por mucho que los belicistas norteamericanos hablen como si estuvieran interesados en el relajamiento de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, no podran ocultar jamas su responsabilidad de la agravacion de tension en esa region.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este lunes y continua:
					
					No es casual que EE.UU. librara cada ano los ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle independientemente del cambio de la situacion.
					
					A traves de las continuas maniobras, EE.UU. adiestra y completa la capacidad operacional para desplegar rapidamente en la Peninsula Coreana sus fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas e infanteria de marina estacionadas en el territorio nacional y en ultramar y lanzar con ellas el ataque tridimensional contra la RPDC junto con el Sur de Corea.
					
					En los presentes ejercicios militares, esta comprobando en la practica la efectividad del peligroso "plan de operaciones conjuntas para hacer frente a la provocacion local" y la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" que fabrico junto con las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Esto comprueba que el simulacro en cuestion es el entrenamiento de ataque para agredir a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Hasta la fecha, la situacion en la Peninsula Coreana estuvo varias veces al borde de guerra, pero no paso a esta gracias a la paciencia de la RPDC.
					
					La RPDC seguira esforzandose con autocontrol y paciencia por defender la paz en la Peninsula Coreana, pero no estara con brazos cruzados ante las maniobras agresivas de los provocadores.
